ygData.subject: Re: Tongues, blue cons, and etiquette
ygData.msgSnippet: Many thanks, Xela. On the blue cons, lemme think . . . they were goblins (warriors or just plain ones), and before I think they conned white. So maybe I m even
ygData.messageBody:
Many thanks, Xela. On the blue cons, lemme think
. . . they were goblins (warriors or just plain
ones), and before I think they conned white. So maybe
I'm even with them or something, now that I went up
to a level. Unfortunately, you pull one of those
things, you pull three, apparently. <br><br>The tongues
are for a quest item that only the small sneaky ones
with beards can use . . . you get the Mining Pick, but
there's a fourth tongue that I have to get by offing a
traitorous Dwarf in Crushbone. That should be an
adventure.<br><br>One other thing that I just thought of -- do Orc
Oracles see through a Rogue's Hide/Sneak? I was poking
around the stone column in Butcherblock, surrounded by
two Cents and an Oracle, when all of a sudden they
spied me and stomped me. I may have hit some key the
betrayed me, but I don't think so. Let's hear it for
/corpse!
